description: This shambling corpse is dressed like a medical professional.  It was either a doctor, or only played one on TV.
This enormous shambling corpse is dressed like a medical professional.  Its entire body bulges with distended muscles and swollen, festering wounds.
This hairless corpse is dressed like a medical professional.  Its pale, pinkish flesh appears to be squirming and moving across its body, quickly covering and fixing any wounds received.

An overgrowth of ossified tissue has replaced this former medical professional's rotting skin with an organic armor of dense bone.  Large clumps of black goo seep from its joints as it shambles aimlessly, with sickening crackling sounds filling the surrounding air.
This is the pale, shuffling corpse of a medical professional.  Its skin looks especially thin, with a sticky, yellow fluid flowing through the clearly visible veins.
